title: Goldman's Olson: See Private Credit Flows Slowing
description:
Kristin Olson, Goldman Sachs’ Global Head of Alternatives for Wealth, says private credit remains resilient, though flows may slow and redemptions edge higher. She tells David Gura and Romaine Bostick on “The Close.”
 (Source: Bloomberg)
